Name: Spiral to Despair
About the game: Spiral to Despair is a blackjack style card game infused with RPG elements set in the depths of hell. You will be facing demons across the hell to solve the mystery of your origin and unravel your story. - Progress through story and clear dungeons by defeating monsters in the game of blackjack, loot items and valuables. - Use potions and flasks in your encounters to enhance your abilities and stats. - Enchant items, unleash legendaries and upgrade charms to get stronger. - Unlock achievements by doing various tasks and progressing. You can export your save to cloud server and access it from another devices and continue your adventure.
